actionConfiguration.body:
select  *   from  sys_product sp 
left join  (select tp.project_product ,count(*) as count_n   from t_project tp where  tp.create_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) and tp.existence = 1  
group by tp.project_product ) tp on sp.product_name = tp.project_product 
where sp.status =1
